mapper.select: select c.districtId, c.val,d.echart_name from (select districtId, count(*) val from (select districtId,url,count(url) urlcount from (select districtId,url from cs_alarm union all select districtId,url from cs_taskwarn) a group by a.districtId,a.url having urlcount>100) b group by b.districtId ) c join cs_district d on c.districtId = d.id
select ipProvice proviceName, count(*) userCount from cs_user group by ipProvice
select * from cs_district where name like CONCAT(#{proName},'%')

select b.*, dis.name districtName from (select districtId,url,count(url) alarmCount from (select districtId,url from cs_alarm union all select districtId,url from cs_taskwarn) a group by a.districtId,a.url) b join cs_district dis where b.districtId = dis.id
select dis.name districtName, asset.addr from cs_asset asset, cs_district dis where asset.assetProvince = dis.id and asset.id in (select distinct assetid from cs_order_asset where ipArray like #{ip})
